title: 3-Diff Fully Automatic Hematology Analyzer
content:
3-Diff Fully Automatic Hematology Analyzer


Parameters
21 reportable parameters: WBC, Gran#, Lym#, Mid#,
Gran%, Lym%, Mid%, RBC, HGB, HCT, MCV, MCH, MCHC,
RDW-SD, RDW-CV, PLT, MPV, PDW, PCT, P-LCR, P-LCC
3 histograms for WBC, RBC and PLT


Principles
Impedance method for WBC, RBC and PLT test
Cyanide free colorimetry for HGB test


Throughput
Up to 60 tests per hour

title: 3-Part Hematology Analyzer
content:
Parameters
21 reportable parameters: WBC, Gran#, Lym#, Mid#,
Gran%, Lym%, Mid%, RBC, HGB, HCT, MCV, MCH, MCHC,
RDW-SD, RDW-CV, PLT, MPV, PDW, PCT, P-LCR, P-LCC
3 histograms for WBC, RBC and PLT

Principles
Impedance method for WBC, RBC and PLT test
Cyanide free colorimetry for HGB test

Throughput
Up to 60 tests per hour

title: Mini 5-Part Hematology Analyzer
content:
Parameters
23 reportable parameters:
WBC, Neu#, Lym#, Mon#, Eos#, Bas#, Neu%, Lym%,
Mon%, Eos%, Bas%, RBC, HGB, HCT, MCV, MCH,
MCHC, RDW-SD, RDW-CV, PLT, MPV, PDW, PCT
4 research parameters: ALY#,ALY%,LIC#,LIC%
3 histograms for WBC, RBC and PLT
Four 2D scattergrams for WBC differention

Principles
Flow Cytometry (FCM) + Tri-angle laser scatter +
Chemical staining method for WBC differention
Impedance method for RBC and PLT test
Cyanide free colorimetry for HGB test

Throughput
Up to 60 tests per hour

title: 5-Part Hematology Analyzer
content:
Parameters
25 reportable parameters: WBC, Neu#, Lym#, Mon#, Eos#,
Bas#, Neu%, Lym%, Mon%, Eos%, Bas%, RBC, HGB, HCT,
MCV, MCH, MCHC, RDW-SD, RDW-CV, PLT, MPV, PDW, PCT,
P-LCR, P-LCC
4 research parameters: ALY#,ALY%,LIC#,LIC%
3 histograms for WBC, RBC and PLT
Three DIFF scattergrams and one BASO scattergram for
WBC differention

Principles
Flow Cytometry (FCM) + Tri-angle laser scatter + Chemical
staining method for WBC differention
Impedance method for RBC and PLT test
Cyanide free colorimetry for HGB test

Throughput
Up to 60 tests per hour

title: Semi auto chemistry analyzer
content:
7" inch true color touch screen
Flow cell&cuvette testing mode
Multifunctional incubator & blood coagulation function
Huge storage of more ythan 300 programs & 200000 sample results

title: Fully auto chemistry analyzer
content:
Throughput: 120/200/400/800 T/H
Automatic liquid level sensing, anti-collision protection.
Integrated full closed optical system, multi wavelength simultaneous detection.
